Title: Object: Die Ruhe in Aegypten (Rest on the flight into Egypt)
Description: The holy family resting on the flight into Egypt; two putti standing to right; donkey in the background to left; after Tobar Lithograph
Producer name: Print made by: Ferdinand Piloty I
Published by: Literarisch-artistischen Anstalt Theodor Riedel
Curator's comments: For another impression with a different address, see 1854,1020.1496.
